name: Append Series With Numbers
description: Appends a series of numbers with new numbers to meet a desired quantity. The new numbers are greater than the current largest number in the series and increase by one.
author: Mark Palmer <success@palmerlife.com>

params.name: desiredQuantity
params.description: The total desired quantity of numbers in the final series.

result.description: The final series of numbers as a comma-separated string.
